hero.subtitle: A high-tech enterprise integrating R&D, production, and sales of pharmaceutical APIs, animal nutrition, and new materials.

home.sectionDesc: Located in Ningxia Helan Industrial Park, covering 130,000 square meters, we are dedicated to advancing the field of guanidine salts and pharmaceutical intermediates.
home.pharmaDesc: World's largest single-line production facility for Metformin Hydrochloride, ensuring global supply stability.
home.nutritionDesc: High-quality Creatine Monohydrate and GAA improving livestock health and growth performance.
home.materialsDesc: Advanced Dicyandiamide (DICY) and curing agents for the next generation of electronic materials.
home.qualityDesc: We employ advanced processing technology and imported equipment, adhering to GMP quality management systems. Our facility boasts an annual capacity of 12,500 tons of Metformin HCL, 10,000 tons of GAA, and 15,000 tons of Creatine series products.
home.newsTitle: Advancing the future of specialty chemicals through strategic partnerships.

products.title: Our
products.subtitle: Innovative solutions across pharmaceuticals, nutrition, and advanced materials

metformin.name: Metformin Hydrochloride
metformin.description: High-quality pharmaceutical raw material used primarily for the treatment of type 2 diabetes. Produced in the world's largest single-line production facility.

creatine.name: Creatine Monohydrate
creatine.description: Premium nutritional supplement widely used in sports nutrition and health products to enhance muscle strength and recovery.

gaa.name: Guanidinoacetic Acid (GAA)
gaa.description: A precursor to creatine, used as a highly effective feed additive to improve growth performance in livestock.

dicy.name: Epoxy Resin Curing Agent (DICY)
dicy.description: Super-fine Dicyandiamide used as a latent curing agent for epoxy resins, offering excellent stability and adhesive properties.

accelerator.name: Accelerator
accelerator.description: Specialized chemical accelerator used to speed up reaction processes in various industrial applications.

sodium.name: Sodium Sarcosinate
sodium.description: An amino acid derivative used in the production of biodegradable surfactants and toothpaste.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Leading the future of specialty chemicals since 2013
about.introPara1: Ningxia Hengkang Technology Co., Ltd. was established in 2013, located in Helan Industrial Park, Ningxia, covering an area of 130,000 square meters with a registered capital of 200 million CNY. We are a technology-oriented enterprise integrating R&D, production, and sales of guanidine salt intermediates, pharmaceutical raw materials, animal nutrition, food health products, and new materials.
about.introPara2: Utilizing advanced processing technology and equipment, we specialize in the R&D of pharmaceutical raw materials and nutritional additives, continuously pursuing cutting-edge scientific development and innovation. Leveraging our rich talent advantages and advanced hardware facilities, we undertake multiple autonomous region-level scientific research demonstration projects. We have achieved outstanding results in process technology innovation for Metformin Hydrochloride, GAA, Creatine, and DICY ultra-fine powder, with relevant technical indicators reaching international advanced levels.
about.introPara3: We have been recognized as a National High-tech Enterprise, Autonomous Region Gazelle Enterprise, Autonomous Region Science and Technology SME, Specialized and Innovative SME, and have obtained certifications from regulatory markets including US FDA, EU CEP, Japan PMDA, Korea KFDA, and Taiwan TDMF. Our management team has over 20 years of experience in pharmaceutical raw material production, R&D, quality assurance, and marketing, with more than 15 years of regulatory market management experience.
about.value1Desc: To become a world-leading manufacturer of specialty chemicals and pharmaceutical intermediates
about.value2Desc: Quality first, endless pursuit of excellence in every product
about.value3Desc: Commitment to environmental protection, safety, and sustainable development
about.value4Desc: Continuous technological innovation and process improvement

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team for inquiries about our products and services.

news.title: News
news.subtitle: Latest updates, company announcements, and industry insights.
news.news1Title: Common Food Additives in Ten Foods
news.news1Summary: What are food additives? They are substances added to food to preserve flavor or enhance taste, appearance, etc. Learn about common additives found in everyday foods.
news.news2Title: Basic Situation of Ningxia Hengkang Technology
news.news2Summary: Established in 2013, located in Helan Industrial Park, Hengkang Technology is a leading enterprise in the region specializing in pharmaceutical intermediates and new materials.
news.news3Title: Annual Output of 15,000 Tons of Metformin Hydrochloride Project
news.news3Summary: Public participation in environmental impact assessment for the new major production line project. The project aims to expand our capacity to meet global demand.
news.news4Summary: Investment project for the technical transformation of 200 tons annual output of Erythromycin. This upgrade will improve efficiency and reduce environmental impact.
news.news5Summary: The annual output of 5,000 tons of creatine production project has passed environmental protection acceptance, marking a significant milestone in our sustainable development.

sustainability.title: Chemistry for a
sustainability.subtitle: We have integrated sustainability into every aspect of our strategy. From raw material sourcing to production efficiency.
sustainability.envDesc: We adhere to the concept of green development, investing heavily in environmental protection facilities. Our 'Three Wastes' treatment meets national standards, and we have established a comprehensive online monitoring system.
sustainability.envPoint1: Advanced waste water treatment and recycling systems
sustainability.safetyDesc: Safety is our lifeline. We strictly implement the policy of 'Safety First, Prevention First, Comprehensive Management', ensuring a safe working environment for all employees.
sustainability.safetyPoint1: Regular safety training and emergency drills
sustainability.safetyPoint2: Strict adherence to safety operation procedures

innovation.title: Technical
innovation.subtitle: Driving the future of chemistry through continuous research and development.
innovation.rdDesc: Dedicated to the development of new pharmaceutical intermediates and high-performance materials.
innovation.processDesc: Continuously optimizing production processes to improve yield and reduce energy consumption.
innovation.patentDesc: Holding numerous patents in guanidine salt synthesis and application technologies.
innovation.achievementsDesc: Through years of dedicated research, we have achieved significant breakthroughs in key technologies, establishing Hengkang as a leader in the industry.

careers.cultureDesc: We believe that our people are our greatest asset. We foster a culture of collaboration, respect, and continuous learning.

careers.value2Desc: Upholding high standards in everything we do.
careers.value3Desc: Providing opportunities for career development and training.
careers.value4Desc: Ensuring the well-being and safety of every employee.
careers.joinDesc: We are always looking for talented individuals to join our team. If you are passionate about chemistry and innovation, we want to hear from you.
